nodes.text: The Concord Dawn system was located within the Mandalore sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. Contained within the star system was the planet Concord Dawn. The star system, along with the surrounding sector, came under the control of the Mandalorians following their expansive conquest of the sector during their time as Mandalorian Crusaders. The one-time Journeyman Protector and Cuy'val Dar training sergeant, Cort Davin, hailed from the Concord Dawn system during the twilight years of the Galactic Republic.
